contest-event.event-date:
June 16, 2013 D Morley March & Hymn Tune Contest
Morley March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
morley-march-hymn-tune-contest
Queen Street, Morley, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK Overall placings decided by summing arena march and hymn points. In the event of tied scores, the arena march score was used as a tiebreaker. Lower section prizes exclude bands placed in the first three overall.
OVERALL CHAMPION (£500): Skelmanthorpe OVERALL 2nd PLACE (£275): Marsden OVERALL 3rd PLACE (£150): Imps BEST SECTION 1 BAND (£100): Hade Edge BEST SECTION 2 BAND (£100): Crofton BEST SECTION 3 BAND (£75): Garforth BEST SECTION 4 BAND (£75): Elmfield BEST YOUTH BAND (£75): Hade Edge Youth BEST CONTEST MARCH (£60): Marsden BEST HYMN TUNE - EXCLUDING YOUTH (£60): Skelmanthorpe BEST HYMN TUNE - YOUTH ONLY (£0): Hade Edge Youth BEST ROAD MARCH (£50): Imps BEST INSTRUMENTALIST (£0): Dale Garner, Soprano, Marsden BEST DEPORTMENT - OPEN (£40): Harrogate BEST DEPORTMENT - YOUTH (£40): Tewit Youth
Feb. 28, 2013, 11:31 a.m. June 17, 2013, 4:58 p.m.
1 Skelmanthorpe Band John Roberts March: The President
2 Marsden Silver Prize Band Glyn Williams March: Knight Templar
3 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band David Nesbitt
4 Hade Edge Simon Wood
5 Drighlington Band Jim Davies
6 Kippax Band David Lancaster

10 Gawthorpe Brass 85 John Edward
11 Shirland Training Band Dave Harvey

13 Harrogate Band Craig Ratcliffe March: The Black Knight
